SelectThisToEnableTheBuyNowOptionInTheAu: Select this to enable the Buy-Now option in the auctions.
TimePeriodsDesc: Here you can define specific time periods the users can choose from when selecting the auction's duration. The numeric value is followed by the abbreviation for a time interval e.g. 4d - 4 days, 2h - 2 hours, 1m - 1 mouth etc. Separate the values with a comma.
